heading: Tonight
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Lows in the teens to lower 20s, some single digits far north. Winds becoming light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: Increasing clouds north, Mostly cloudy south, with a rising chance of snow or wintry mix by midday, and a rising chance mid to late afternoon in the north; 1 to 3 inches of snow in the south, mainly over high terrain, a trace to an inch north. Valley highs in the mid to upper 30s, with temperatures falling once precipitation begins. South to southeast winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Friday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Snow likely, with 2 to 5 inches, locally 7 inches in the mountains. Lows in the teens to lower 20s. Winds variable to east around 5 mph.
